name: Today Is Monday
description:
Today Is Monday is my try on the classic room escape genre. It can be very hard or completed in 2 minutes, all up to you.

I made this game/thingy in 2 days, so there isn't so much to it. Hope you like it anyways!

If you encounter possible bugs or other things, feel free to tell about them in the comments! I will see what I can do.
